0.name: Red powder
0.desc: Crafting material used to brew red potions.

1.name: Food
1.desc: Of no use to individuals, this is in contrast the most important resource for a settlement, allowing them to maintain food surplus and develop. Make sure to sell your food to your settlement! Food can be obtained from dead animals or gathered by specific resource buildings.

3.name: Timber
3.desc: Used by settlements to build new buildings.

4.name: Bomb
4.desc: Explosive usable in battle to harm multiple targets (friends or foes) simultaneously.

5.name: Root
5.desc: Root of a common plant all over the Continent. Crafting material involved in the brewing of several types of potions.

6.name: Cradle
6.desc: Bitter potion made of Daybreak and clover, regenerates a lot of health.

7.name: Wood
7.desc: Crafting material used to make wooden weapons or to make charcoal.

8.name: Thick Grass
8.desc: Crafting material used to make string.

9.name: Pelt
9.desc: Crafting material obtained from dead animals. Used to craft several pieces of equipment. Also very valuable to sell to settlements.

14.name: Butterflower
14.desc: Flower with regenerative properties used to brew potions.

17.name: Daybreak
17.desc: Alchemical substance used to brew healing potions.

18.name: Clover
18.desc: Plant used as alchemical ingredient for brewing health potions.

21.name: String
21.desc: Robust string made from plant fibers, primarily used to make bows.

22.name: Coal
22.desc: Crafting material that can be mined or obtained from wood. Can be used to heat furnaces, as an ingredient for antidotes or can be converted into carbon.

23.name: Carbon
23.desc: Crafting material obtained from coal. In combination with iron, it can be used to make steel.

24.name: Iron ore
24.desc: Crafting material that can be mined and used to make steel for several items.

25.name: Gold ore
25.desc: Precious crafting material that can be mined and is ultimately used to mint coins.

26.name: Stone
26.desc: Crafting material used to make primitive weapons.

27.name: Bone
27.desc: Crafting material obtained from dead animals used to make primitive weapons.

28.name: Stone hatchet
28.desc: Basic weapon of fortune that can be crafted from wood and stone.

30.name: Feather
30.desc: Crafting material used to make arrows.

31.name: Wheat
31.desc: Resource harvested from farms that can be converted into food at a Mill.

32.name: Iron ingot
32.desc: Intermediate crafting material obtained from iron ore destined to make steel.

33.name: Steel ingot
33.desc: Intermediate crafting material obtained from iron ingots and carbon and used to forge weapons.

34.name: Sulfur
34.desc: Crafting material used to make black powder.

35.name: Black powder
35.desc: Crafting material made from coal and sulfur used to make bullets and explosives.

36.name: Stingleaf
36.desc: Plant with cleansing properties used to brew potions.

37.name: Whitepetal
37.desc: Flower with cleansing properties used to brew potions.

38.name: Gold ingot
38.desc: Precious rafting material obtained from golden ore destined to mint coins.

41.name: Crimson dust
41.desc: Enhanced gunpowder used to craft advanced explosives and ammunition.

43.name: Leather
43.desc: Crafting material made from pelts used to craft various pieces of equipment.

44.name: Crimson strike
44.desc: Advanced explosive, inflicts much more damage than traditional bombs.

45.name: Shack
45.desc: A small dwelling where you can rest.

46.name: Lumber camp
46.desc: This small camp produces a little bit of timber.

47.name: Defense tower
47.desc: A wooden tower which can shoot at enemies.
